long_description: Novara Express 2.0 bike pants pack small but protect big, handling almost anything Ma Nature might conjure up for your bike commute. Pants are made of nylon that's waterproof, breathable and windproof to 60+ mph. Elastic waist with drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Articulated knees improve your range of motion. Side zippers from knees to ankles allow easy on/off over bike shoes. Inner ankle on right pant leg is reinforced for protection against crank and chain abrasion. Ankle cuffs have adjustable rip-and-stick closures. Reflective detailing on the Novara Express 2.0 bike pants increases your visibility in low light.
